mapper.sql:
from infrCodeGroup a where 1=1 AND ifcgDelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND ifcgSeq = #{shValue} AND ifcgName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ifcgNameEng LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.ifcgSeq , a.ifcgName , a.ifcgNameEng ,(select count(aa.ifcdSeq) from infrCode aa where 1=1 and aa.ifcdDelNy = 0 and aa.ifcgSeq = a.ifcgSeq) as xifcdSeq
ORDER BY a.ifcgSeq DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE infrCodeGroup SET ifcgDelNy = 1 WHERE ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT ifcdSeq , ifcdName , ifcgSeq FROM infrCode WHERE 1=1 AND ifcdDelNy = 0 AND ifcdUseNy = 1
